content.c_answer2: The running time for My Neighbour Totoro is 2 hours 45 minutes (incl. interval). Performances starting at 2pm finish at approx. 4:45pm, and performances starting at 7pm finish at approx. 9:45pm.
content.name: How long is My Neighbour Totoro and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is My Neighbour Totoro and when does it finish?
